name: What the Snow Hides
description:
Made the for Unreal 2020 GameJam

Your name is John Soldierman, and your mission is to travel to heart of the world to awaken it from it's slumber but be careful.  You're not alone.  

Features:

  • Shoot zombies with your pistol
  • Collect key items and use them to advance
  • Explore a large world with differing locals
  • Enjoy a classical experience inspired by RE

Controls:

"w" moves forward

"a" turns left

"d" turns right

Hold down right mouse to stop and aim

Left click to fire while aiming

Press "r" to reload while aiming

"T" uses a medkit if you have one

"e" picks up or interacts with items

"alt + f4" closes the game

Credits:

Work on the game done by Marshall Dimperio, Gabriel Schaerf, Elizabeth Bellissimo and Carlissac, Nicolas
